pkgmetadata.longdescription: Deep Boosting Ensemble Modeling // Provides deep boosting models training, evaluation, predicting and hyper parameter optimising using grid search and cross validation. Based on Google's Deep Boosting algorithm, and Google's C++ implementation. Cortes, C., Mohri, M., Syed, U. (2014) http://machinelearning.wustl.ed u/mlpapers/papers/icml2014c2_cortesb14.
